summary: Batman has not been seen for ten years. A new breed of criminal ravages Gotham City, forcing 55-year-old Bruce Wayne back into the cape and cowl. But, does he still have what it takes to fight crime in a new era?
cast: Peter Weller|Ariel Winter|David Selby|Wade Williams|Carlos Alazraqui|Dee Bradley Baker|Paget Brewster|Maria Canals-Barrera|Cathy Cavadini|Townsend Coleman|Grey Griffin|Richard Doyle|Greg Eagles|Michael Emerson|Michael Jackson|Danny Jacobs|Maurice LaMarche|Yuri Lowenthal|Michael McKean|Sam McMurray|Jim Meskimen|Rob Paulsen|Andrea Romano|Tara Strong|James Patrick Stuart|Gary Anthony Sturgis|James Arnold Taylor|Bruce Timm|Jim Ward|Frank Welker|Gary Anthony Williams|Jim Wise|Gwendoline Yeo
keywords: batman character|gotham city|dc comics|based on comic book|superhero
title: Batman: El Regreso del Caballero Oscuro. Primera Parte
